import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { ContactServices } from '../../../Services/ContactServices' const AddContact = () => { let navigate=useNavigate() let[state,setState]=useState({ loading:true, contact:{ name:"", photo:"", mobile:"", email:"", title:"", company:"", groupId:"" }, errorMessage:"" }) const updateHandle=(event)=>{ setState({...state,loading:true}) } const submitHandle=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault() let promise=new Promise((res,rej)=>{ setState({...state,loading:true}) let postData=ContactServices.createContact(contact) res(postData) }) promise.then((res1)=>{ }) } return ( <>
